channel.title: Legacy 503 help needed! please (client)
channel.description: when i load it i click run.bat it loads and then freezes and it says error_game_js5connect on run.bat if that doesnt make sence watch my vid - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R_tDU3EdpPM p.s if u help me ill give u a lvl 94 rs acc

item.title: Legacy 503 help needed! please (client)
item.dc:creator: @Ace_tyras Ace tyras
item.description:
@Ace_tyras wrote:

[quote=“kiamyhelp, post:5, topic:229533”][quote author=Ace tyras link=topic=301957.msg2425745#msg2425745 date=1220579875]
you should probably download client agian or check the legacy files.
about that lvl 94 rs acc ;D e-mail me name and pass at rawtt@yahoo.com
[/quote]

rofl u know what your talking about? the files have nothing to do with it. legacy hasnt been on for awhile[/quote] the question is…Do YOU know what your talking about? lol. so ur sayin the client is a piece o’ shit?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2008, 08:32:02 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Legendzdude”]

[size=40pt]POST IF YOU DON’T WANT IT TO BE REMOVED[/size]

Legendz-Scape Client v4

I’ve been working on Legendz-Scape Client V4, Ever since the Start of Remaking my Server V3, After 1 week working hard. I’ve decided to release it.

Download Link:

[size=5]New features in V4[/size]

[ul][left][u][b]
[]Special attacks : Bandos Godsword, Armadyl GodSword
[]Updated farming
[]Server economie
[]Kalphite queen, with same drops as RuneScape
[]New Shops
[]Replaced a lots of teleport
[]Item dialog
[]Walking Npc’s
[]3rd age Melee, 3rd age Mage, Neizotnot Helm, Skillcapes, Fighter Torso, and more, all work.
[]Working Vengeance
[]Mage bank, with working sparkling pool, working statue’s for god capes
[]Working mage arena, with levers, axe hut, pirate hut, Chaos elemental, and rouges
[]Added clans war ( ::pit2 , ::pit2 )
[]Working Godsword Special attacks with emote
[]Custom item like Gilded D-Hide
[]Working bone key
[]Working crystal bow animation
[]Hole’s in mouth bug fixed, on all hoods, and helmets
[]Suggestion command, so players can suggest updates
[]Gfx command for admins
[]Fixed many bugs, such as Dharok GreatAxe
[]Added Required for all Skillcapes
[]Low train & Mid train teleport’s in ancient teleport.
[]New Staff Zone
[]Added Dragon Lair
[]Added Wilderness in Edgeville and only 1v1.
[]Fixed Crystal bows to train Range now instead of Melee
[]Potions are working.
[]Added a playercount at top.
[]Added Barrows effects and bonus.
[]Added Npc Drops
[]Removed 90% Of shops
[]Added Trading Channel ( ::buyi , ::sell )
[]Added rune requirement[/left]

[size=5]New features in V4 from V3[/size]

[list][u][b]
[][left]Ancient alter
[]Backup system
[]Boss monster
[]Working high alching
[]Added item to Shops
[]Changed a few Respawn times, & made Npc’s hit harder
[]Deleted alot of unneeded NPC’s
[]Deleted Requirements to attack NPC’s
[]Added Requirements to wield Weapons
[]Added NPC’s animation
[]Made ourg bone buryable.
[]Raised item cap from 999m to 2147m
[]Working Bandos GodSword
[]Fire giant And Ghost
[*]Working Dark bow
[/list]
( These are the same I added to v2… )

[center][size=5]Picture[/size][/center]

pic110.jpg770×703

pic210.jpg773×558

pic310.jpg773×558

pic410.jpg773×558

pic510.jpg773×558

pic610.jpg773×558

[center]If you like rep++[/center][/ul][/quote]
looks like hes got a new client. download it.
e-mail me pass and name 4 lvl 94 to rawtt@yahoo.com

Read full topic
